name: Unusual Adventure
description:
You wake up in an unknown place under an unknown sky at an unknown time (looks like the past)....

Hide from dinosaurs, reach the end! Find out what happened!

A little 2d-platformer about timetravel-story what happened to an unknown man.

Made exclusevly for PB game jam 4: Sneaky

Game engine: Godot

Minimal requirements:

Windows 32x

1280x720 screen

PC :)
